CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(RF2_Customer_Financial_Rating__c), "Insolvency risk",IMAGE( '/resource/RedRiskImage', 'Red',20,40), "Customer plans to sell",IMAGE( '/resource/RedRiskImage', 'Red',20,40), "Poor financial health, doesn’t pay", IMAGE('/resource/RedRiskImage', 'Red',20,40), "Poor financial health, pays on time", IMAGE('/resource/RedRiskImage', 'Red',20,40), "Good financial health, doesn’t pay",IMAGE( '/resource/GreenGoImage', 'Green',20,40), "Good financial health, pays on time",IMAGE( '/resource/GreenGoImage', 'Green',20,40), "")
CustomField.label: RAG
